landing.title: CareCard
landing.subtitle: Share what matters, instantly
landing.badge: üöÄ Everything that matters, always with you
landing.description: The information that can make a difference, always within reach. Create digital emergency cards accessible via QR code, NFC or shareable links.
landing.storyContent: "Dad, you can find me with your AirTag, but how can I call you when someone finds me?" This simple question from Nicol√≤, my son, revealed a crucial gap: location trackers help us find lost items, but they don't help others contact us when they find our belongings or, more importantly, when they find us.
landing.storyProblem: Location tags like AirTag, Samsung SmartTag, and Tile are excellent for tracking, but they lack emergency contact information. CareCard bridges this gap by creating digital emergency cards that work alongside your existing tracking devices.
landing.useCasesDescription: While Nicol√≤'s question was just one example that sparked the idea, CareCard serves countless scenarios where contact information is crucial:
landing.whatIsIceDescription: Emergency Contact Information allows first responders to access your emergency contact information and critical medical details quickly during an emergency.
landing.step1Description: Enter your personal details, medical information, and emergency contacts using our secure form.
landing.step2Description: Create a digital emergency card that displays your information in an emergency-optimized format.
landing.step3Description: Generate QR codes, create NFC-compatible links, or download printable PDFs. All data stays on your device.
landing.feature1Description: All data is stored locally on your device. No servers, no tracking, complete privacy.
landing.feature2Description: Generate QR codes, NFC-compatible links, or PDFs with embedded QR codes for maximum flexibility.
landing.feature3Description: Large text, clear layout, and prominent contact buttons for emergency situations.
landing.feature4Description: Optimized links for programming NFC tags with compressed data that fits all tag types.
landing.integrationDescription: CareCard works seamlessly alongside your existing tracking devices:
landing.airtagDescription: Add NFC stickers with emergency data to complement AirTag's location tracking. While AirTag helps you find items, emergency contact info helps others contact you.
landing.smarttagDescription: Leverage SmartTag2's built-in NFC chip to store your emergency information directly on the device for 700+ days of battery life.
landing.tileDescription: Combine Tile's 400ft range and loud alerts with QR codes containing your emergency contact information for complete protection.
landing.integrationBenefitDescription: Location tracking + Emergency contact information = Complete peace of mind for you and your loved ones.
landing.useCase1Description: Children, elderly relatives, or anyone who might need emergency assistance. Attach to backpacks, clothing, or personal items.
landing.useCase2Description: Dogs, cats, and other beloved animals. Collar tags with QR codes ensure your pet can be returned quickly if lost.
landing.useCase3Description: Suitcases, travel bags, and valuable items. International travelers can include multiple contact methods and languages.
landing.useCase4Description: Laptops, cameras, musical instruments, or any important belongings. Professional contact info for business items.
landing.useCase5Description: Share your Instagram, TikTok, or other social profiles with a simple QR code. Perfect for creators and professionals.
landing.useCase6Description: House, car, or office keys. A QR code on your keychain lets anyone who finds them contact you immediately.
landing.secureData: üîí Your data never leaves your device
landing.openSource: Open source and free to use
